Summary: green ball hovering,then takes off straight up
divs: Sighting Detailsi live in ricmond,va.my friend and i were on our way to another friend house off of hull st.we go down a back road to get to his house.my friend was driving,i was in the passengers seat.you could stare ahead and see the clear night sky,not too many stars were out that night.im a star gazer so im always looking.it just so happens this one night,not to sure the exact date,im looking.i see this big luminated green ball hovering,where it came from i havent a clue, it was just there.i think that radio went out because it was silent when this happened.it was perfectly still and you couldnt hear a thing.i was wondering what in the world could this be,but in my heart i knew exactly what it was.the more we go down this street,the more you could see this object.then,about a few moments later it just takes off straight up in the air.just gone.it was so fast going into the sky.it was amazing.i was in awe.i sat silent for a minute,then i looked to my friend and asked him if he had seen anything,not saying what i saw,he described the same thing.i was kind of nervous because i wasn't sure if he had seen it also.after he admits what he saw,we bothed talked about it very excited knowing that what we had saw was not from this world.we were histaricle by the time we got to my other friends house,trying to tell them our story,and of course they didnt believe us.but this is true,and i completely stick to my story
